statements: SELECT * FROM HotelFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT guest_name, rating FROM HotelFeedback WHERE review_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text FROM HotelFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM HotelFeedback WHERE feedback_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT guest_name, rating FROM HotelFeedback WHERE rating < 2;
SELECT * FROM HotelFeedback WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT guest_name, feedback_text FROM HotelFeedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM HotelFeedback WHERE guest_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT feedback_id, review_date FROM HotelFeedback WHERE rating = 4;
SELECT guest_name, feedback_text, rating FROM HotelFeedback WHERE review_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM HotelFeedback WHERE rating <= 3;
SELECT feedback_id, guest_name FROM HotelFeedback WHERE feedback_text IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM HotelFeedback WHERE review_date > '2022-02-01' AND rating < 4;
SELECT MAX(rating), MIN(rating) FROM HotelFeedback;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HotelFeedback WHERE guest_name = 'Alice';
SELECT DISTINCT rating FROM HotelFeedback;
SELECT AVG(rating) FROM HotelFeedback WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, COUNT(*) FROM HotelFeedback GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT SUM(rating) FROM HotelFeedback WHERE review_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM HotelFeedback ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM HotelFeedback WHERE rating >= 4 AND review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, feedback_text FROM HotelFeedback WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM HotelFeedback;
SELECT guest_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM HotelFeedback GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, feedback_text, review_date FROM HotelFeedback ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM HotelFeedback WHERE guest_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT guest_name) AS total_guests FROM HotelFeedback;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS overall_average_rating FROM HotelFeedback;
SELECT guest_name, MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM HotelFeedback GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT feedback_id, guest_name, feedback_text, rating, review_date FROM HotelFeedback WHERE feedback_text ILIKE '%great%' OR feedback_text ILIKE '%excellent%';
SELECT guest_name, feedback_text, review_date FROM HotelFeedback WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM HotelFeedback GROUP BY rating HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT guest_name, review_date, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM review_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM HotelFeedback GROUP BY guest_name, month ORDER BY guest_name, month;
SELECT guest_name, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM HotelFeedback GROUP BY guest_name HAVING SUM(rating) > 20;
SELECT guest_name, feedback_text, rating, review_date FROM HotelFeedback WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT feedback_id, guest_name, feedback_text, rating, review_date FROM HotelFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%complaint%';
SELECT guest_name, feedback_text, review_date FROM HotelFeedback WHERE guest_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT DISTINCT guest_name, feedback_text FROM HotelFeedback WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY guest_name;
SELECT DISTINCT review_date FROM HotelFeedback ORDER BY review_date;
SELECT * FROM HotelFeedback WHERE feedback_id = (SELECT MAX(feedback_id) FROM HotelFeedback);
SELECT * FROM Hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM Hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, rating FROM Hotels WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM GuestFeedback;
SELECT guest_name, feedback_text FROM GuestFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT hotel_name, rating FROM Hotels JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, feedback_text FROM Hotels JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id WHERE Hotels.rating > 4;
SELECT hotel_name, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM Hotels JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id GROUP BY Hotels.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Hotels JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id GROUP BY Hotels.hotel_id;
SELECT location, COUNT(hotel_id) AS total_hotels FROM Hotels GROUP BY location;
SELECT hotel_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM Hotels JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id GROUP BY Hotels.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, feedback_text FROM Hotels LEFT JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, feedback_text FROM Hotels RIGHT JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, feedback_text FROM Hotels LEFT JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id WHERE GuestFeedback.hotel_id IS NULL;
SELECT hotel_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Hotels LEFT JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id GROUP BY Hotels.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, location, rating FROM Hotels UNION SELECT hotel_name, location, rating FROM Hotels;
SELECT * FROM Hotels ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, rating FROM Hotels WHERE rating > (SELECT AVG(rating) FROM Hotels);
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM Hotels WHERE rating IN (SELECT rating FROM GuestFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%');
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Hotels;
SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, location, MAX(rating) FROM Hotels GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM Hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM Hotels WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, location, rating, feedback_id, guest_name, feedback_text FROM Hotels JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, location, rating, feedback_text FROM Hotels JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id WHERE GuestFeedback.rating > 3;
SELECT hotel_name, location, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM Hotels GROUP BY hotel_name;
SELECT hotel_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM Hotels LEFT JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel_name;
SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM GuestFeedback GROUP BY hotel_id HAVING avg_rating > 3;
SELECT hotel_name, location, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM GuestFeedback JOIN Hotels ON GuestFeedback.hotel_id = Hotels.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel_name;
SELECT hotel_name, location, MIN(rating) AS min_rating FROM GuestFeedback JOIN Hotels ON GuestFeedback.hotel_id = Hotels.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel_name;
SELECT hotel_name, location, feedback_text FROM Hotels LEFT JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%';

SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, location, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM Hotels LEFT JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel_id HAVING total_feedback > 5;
SELECT hotel_name, location, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Hotels WHERE location = 'New York' GROUP BY hotel_name;

SELECT hotel_name, location, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM Hotels JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id WHERE GuestFeedback.rating > 3 GROUP BY hotel_name HAVING total_feedback > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT hotel_name FROM Hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM Hotels WHERE rating > 3 GROUP BY hotel_name HAVING total_rating > 50;

SELECT hotel_name, location, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM Hotels JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id WHERE GuestFeedback.feedback_text LIKE '%dirty%' GROUP BY hotel_name;

SELECT hotel_name, location, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM Hotels JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id WHERE GuestFeedback.guest_name = 'John Smith' GROUP BY hotel_name;
SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, location, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Hotels GROUP BY location;
SELECT hotel_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM GuestFeedback WHERE rating < 2 GROUP BY hotel_name HAVING total_feedback > 3;

SELECT hotel_name, location, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Hotels LEFT JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel_name HAVING avg_rating > 3 AND total_feedback < 20;

SELECT hotel_name, location, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Hotels LEFT JOIN GuestFeedback ON Hotels.hotel_id = GuestFeedback.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel_name HAVING avg_rating > 4 OR total_feedback > 15;

SELECT h.hotel_name, AVG(g.rating) AS avg_rating FROM Hotels h JOIN GuestFeedback g ON h.hotel_id = g.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_name;
SELECT h.hotel_name, MAX(r.date_posted) AS latest_review FROM Hotels h JOIN Reviews r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_name;
SELECT h.hotel_name, MIN(r.date_posted) AS earliest_review FROM Hotels h JOIN Reviews r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_name;

SELECT hotel_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM hotels INNER JOIN feedback ON hotels.hotel_id = feedback.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel_name;

SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE guest_id NOT IN (1, 2);

SELECT guest_name, email FROM guests ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hotels;
SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, location, star_rating FROM Hotels;
SELECT * FROM Guests;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, email, phone_number FROM Guests;
SELECT * FROM Reviews;
SELECT review_id, hotel_id, guest_id, rating, comment FROM Reviews;
SELECT * FROM Amenities;
SELECT amenity_id, amenity_name, description FROM Amenities;
SELECT * FROM HotelAmenities;
SELECT hotel_id, amenity_id FROM HotelAmenities;
SELECT h.hotel_name, a.amenity_name FROM Hotels h JOIN HotelAmenities ha ON h.hotel_id = ha.hotel_id JOIN Amenities a ON ha.amenity_id = a.amenity_id;
SELECT h.hotel_name, g.guest_name, r.rating FROM Hotels h JOIN Reviews r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN Guests g ON r.guest_id = g.guest_id;
SELECT h.hotel_name, AVG(r.rating) AS average_rating FROM Hotels h JOIN Reviews r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_name;
SELECT h.hotel_name, COUNT(r.review_id) AS num_reviews FROM Hotels h LEFT JOIN Reviews r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_name;
SELECT h.hotel_name, a.amenity_name, a.description FROM Hotels h LEFT JOIN HotelAmenities ha ON h.hotel_id = ha.hotel_id LEFT JOIN Amenities a ON ha.amenity_id = a.amenity_id;
SELECT h.hotel_name, g.guest_name, r.rating, r.comment FROM Hotels h JOIN Reviews r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN Guests g ON r.guest_id = g.guest_id;
SELECT h.hotel_name, r.rating, r.comment FROM Hotels h JOIN Reviews r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id WHERE r.rating > 4;
SELECT g.guest_name, COUNT(r.review_id) AS num_reviews FROM Guests g LEFT JOIN Reviews r ON g.guest_id = r.guest_id GROUP BY g.guest_name;
SELECT h.hotel_name, COUNT(ra.amenity_id) AS num_amenities FROM Hotels h JOIN HotelAmenities ra ON h.hotel_id = ra.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_name;
SELECT h.hotel_name, AVG(r.rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(r.review_id) AS num_reviews FROM Hotels h JOIN Reviews r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_name HAVING AVG(r.rating) > 3;
SELECT g.guest_name, MAX(r.rating) AS highest_rating FROM Guests g JOIN Reviews r ON g.guest_id = r.guest_id GROUP BY g.guest_name;
SELECT * FROM Hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, location, star_rating FROM Hotels WHERE star_rating >= 4;
SELECT hotel_name, location, COUNT(*) AS num_reviews FROM Hotels JOIN Reviews ON Hotels.hotel_id = Reviews.hotel_id GROUP BY Hotels.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Hotels JOIN Reviews ON Hotels.hotel_id = Reviews.hotel_id GROUP BY Hotels.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, location, amenity_name FROM Hotels JOIN HotelAmenities ON Hotels.hotel_id = HotelAmenities.hotel_id JOIN Amenities ON HotelAmenities.amenity_id = Amenities.amenity_id;
SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number FROM Guests WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT guest_name, email FROM Guests WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT guest_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Guests JOIN Reviews ON Guests.guest_id = Reviews.guest_id GROUP BY Guests.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, hotel_name, rating, comment FROM Guests JOIN Reviews ON Guests.guest_id = Reviews.guest_id JOIN Hotels ON Reviews.hotel_id = Hotels.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, location, star_rating FROM Hotels ORDER BY star_rating DESC;
SELECT guest_name, email, hotel_name, rating, comment FROM Guests JOIN Reviews ON Guests.guest_id = Reviews.guest_id JOIN Hotels ON Reviews.hotel_id = Hotels.hotel_id WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT hotel_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS num_reviews FROM Hotels JOIN Reviews ON Hotels.hotel_id = Reviews.hotel_id GROUP BY Hotels.hotel_id HAVING AVG(rating) >= 4;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM Hotels WHERE star_rating > (SELECT AVG(star_rating) FROM Hotels);
SELECT hotel_name, COUNT(*) AS num_amenities FROM Hotels JOIN HotelAmenities ON Hotels.hotel_id = HotelAmenities.hotel_id GROUP BY Hotels.hotel_id;

SELECT hotel_name, location, amenity_name FROM Hotels JOIN HotelAmenities ON Hotels.hotel_id = HotelAmenities.hotel_id JOIN Amenities ON HotelAmenities.amenity_id = Amenities.amenity_id WHERE amenity_name = 'Pool';
SELECT guest_name, hotel_name, rating, comment FROM Guests JOIN Reviews ON Guests.guest_id = Reviews.guest_id JOIN Hotels ON Reviews.hotel_id = Hotels.hotel_id WHERE comment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT hotel_name, star_rating, COUNT(*) AS num_reviews FROM Hotels JOIN Reviews ON Hotels.hotel_id = Reviews.hotel_id GROUP BY Hotels.hotel_id ORDER BY num_reviews DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, location, avg_rating FROM Hotels JOIN (SELECT hotel_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Reviews GROUP BY hotel_id) AS subquery ON Hotels.hotel_id = subquery.hotel_id;
SELECT guest_name, COUNT(*) AS num_reviews FROM Guests JOIN Reviews ON Guests.guest_id = Reviews.guest_id GROUP BY Guests.guest_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

SELECT hotel_name, location, amenity_name FROM Hotels JOIN HotelAmenities ON Hotels.hotel_id = HotelAmenities.hotel_id JOIN Amenities ON HotelAmenities.amenity_id = Amenities.amenity_id WHERE hotel_name LIKE '%Marriott%';
